title: Great Company to Work For
cons: Work/Life Balance as a golf professional is not good

title: Overall Great Place to Work
pros: Some perks of this job are the flexible schedules, ability to play the course on your off time, health insurance, 401K, and much more.
cons: Need to have more incentives for employees. This employer evaluates its performance by using surveys. The down side is there is no reward for getting high survey scores.
